[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: XYZ integrates with APIs, storage systems, and analytics tools.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: XYZ offers a web dashboard and CLI for workflow management.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: XYZ supports cloud, on-premise, and distributed systems.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: XYZ processes OS-compatible data formats and interacts with databases.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: XYZ optimizes memory for real-time and batch processing.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: XYZ ensures uptime with failover mechanisms.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: XYZ supports cloud, on-premise, and hybrid deployments.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 MISSING-TAG2: XYZ ensures secure data exchange with encryption.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The XYZ defines requirements for managing, processing, and analyzing data workflows while integrating with analytics and reporting tools.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: XYZ handles data ingestion, processing, and visualization.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: Designed for analysts, engineers, and IT professionals.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: XYZ depends on stable network infrastructure and accurate input.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: XYZ assumes compatibility with APIs, databases, and authentication.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Data Ingestion: Collecting data for processing.
Dashboard: User interface for monitoring performance.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 MISSING-TAG1: XYZ processes structured and unstructured data across industries, supporting real-time and batch analytics.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall interface with APIs for data ingestion.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall support encrypted data exchange.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall provide dashboards for workflow monitoring.
[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-002: The system shall allow multi-user access with role-based permissions.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall generate insights using machine learning.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall log operations for auditing.
[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-002: The database shall follow ACID compliance.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system architecture shall support modular scalability.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall comply with ISO/IEC 27001.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-002: The system shall maintain logs for compliance.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process 10TB of data in 30 minutes.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 MISSING-TAG3.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support roughly a thousand queries simultaneously, ensuring consistent response times.

[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: Manuals, API documentation, and troubleshooting guides.
[SEC] 5. References: ISO/IEC 27001, API standards, and database protocols.
